one project supports the servers and applications like Auto FinanceData Warehouse Bank Online Banking Call Centre ECommerce etc Roles Responsibilities Installation and configuration of MS SQL Server inhouse servers Server connection Issues for client sites for Support Groups Integration and Development and even from outside clients Responsible for SQL Server and OS service packs deployed
